flawed_nl_solution:
The salon made $200.0.00 and they charge $20.0.00 per client so there are 200.0/20.0 = <<200.0/20.0=10.0>>10.0 clients in the salon
There are 210 fingers in the salon and everyone has 10 fingers so there are 210/10 = <<210/10=12.0>>12.0 people in the salon
If there are 12.0 people in the salon and 10.0 are clients then there are 12.0-10.0 = <<12.0-10.0=2.0>>2.0 people in the salon that are not clients

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21.0, not 12.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
